description: The ultimate fast food, omelettes are extremely quick to make and very tasty too – perfect for a nutritious and satisfying breakfast or brunch.
keywords: Omelette,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Classic Omelette Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the eggs in a bowl and season to taste. Melt the butter in a frying pan over a moderate heat and pour in the egg mixture.
Tilt the pan to spread the egg mixture evenly. Stir the eggs with a fork, stopping as soon as they are set. Fold the side of the omelette closest to the handle halfway over itself.
Sharply tap the handle so the bottom side of the omelet curls over. Slide the omelette to the edge of the pan. Transfer to a serving plate, and serve with a fresh green salad on the side.
